body.name: Cute Mushroom Kids Water Bottle with Straw Lid, BPA Free, 12oz Stainless Steel Vacuum Insulated Leakproof Flask Kids Thermos for Toddlers, School, Office
features: 【Material】Our kids water bottle made of high-quality 304 stainless steel, BPA-free, high temperature resistant, environmentally friendly, Does not transfer flavor, and will not cause harm to the human body. Double wall design can reduce heat dissipation, and has good thermal insulation performance.

【Leak-proof】The design of the bottle lid and Pop-up straws are combined, which can one hand used to ensure cleanliness and hygiene. Equipped with polyethylene straw, safe, resistant to high temperature and deformation. The bottle with anti-spill valve to prevent liquid spillage. and convenient drinking.

【Super Insulation】The inner and outer wall of this kettle is equipped with a heat insulation layer and a vacuum temperature lock layer, which can refrigerate the beverage for 24 hours and keep it warm for 10 hours. Very suitable for outdoor activities, such as camping, driving, running, beach etc.

【Multifunctional】7.7 x 2.8 inches. This lightweight kettle can hold 350ml/12oz of water and can be placed in a bag without taking up much space. The widened handle design can be easily lifted with two fingers, making it more portable.

【Occasions】This durable kids water bottle not only stylish appearance, easy to carry, but also allows you to hydrate at any time, very suitable for Christmas, Valentine's Day, birthday, baby shower gifts for children.
body.description: Specifications: Material: 304 stainless steel. Packaging: 1x Kids Water Bottle Capacity: 350ML/12OZ. Features: Double-walled design, good heat preservation, good sealing of the cap, no leakage, very suitable for putting in the bag, easy to carry. Pop-up straw design, can be used with one hand, so you can drink more convenient, very suitable for children and adults to use. Instructions: 1. Minors please use under the guidance of adults or after reporting. 2. Clean the inside and outside of the cup with neutral detergent in warm water before use. 3. In order to achieve the best effect of keeping the cup hot and cold, it is recommended to add hot water or ice water for preheating or pre-cooling. It is better to add ice cubes when keeping cold. 4. To prevent leakage, please tighten the lid of the cup clockwise when the cup body is tilted. NOTE: 1. Add boiling water to the cup, do not use straws when drinking to prevent burns. 2. When adding boiling water to the cup, it should not be too full to prevent scalds from overflowing. 3. Avoid falling, collision or strong impact to cause the cup body to deform and affect the product's efficacy. 4. Avoid direct heating or placing it in a high temperature place. It is strictly forbidden to heat the product in an open flame, microwave oven, induction cooker, or dishwasher. 5. When cleaning, please use neutral detergent and warm water to clean, do not use alkaline bleach, chemical wipes and other cleaning agents. 6. After filling perishable beverages such as milk, please drink and wash as soon as possible to avoid deterioration of the inner tank. 7. Do not use it for other purposes except cold and heat preservation.
